   function getOptanonCookie(name) {
        var value = "; " + document.cookie;
        var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
        if (parts.length == 2)
            return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
    }
    var isClosed = getOptanonCookie("OptanonAlertBoxClosed");
    var isConsent = getOptanonCookie("OptanonConsent");

    if(isClosed == null){
        document.cookie = 'OptanonConsent=; domain=.st.com; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 2000 00:00:01 GMT;';
    }

   // Function to set indicator value based on the token.
    function setIndicator({
    name: t,
    delta: e
    }) {
        var a = "CLS" == t ? "cls" : "FID" == t ? "fid" : "LCP" == t ? "lcp" : null;
        null != a && RProfiler &&
        RProfiler.addInfo("indicator", a, parseFloat(parseFloat(e).toFixed(2)))
    }

    // Set Web Vital metrics on DOMContentLoaded event.
    addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", (function () {
        webVitals.getCLS(setIndicator);
        webVitals.getFID(setIndicator);
        webVitals.getLCP(setIndicator)

    }))
  </script>

        var sPageURL = decodeURIComponent(window.location.search.substring(1)), sURLVariables = sPageURL.split('&'),
            sParameterName, i;
        for (i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {
            sParameterName = sURLVariables[i].split('=');

                return sParameterName[1] === undefined ? true : sParameterName[1];

       var screenSearchTypeDetected = getSearchScreenType();

    if (screenSearchTypeDetected == 'mobile') {
		var searchWidgetProductNoConfig = getSearchConfig("2", "");
		var searchWidgetKeywordsNoConfig = getSearchConfig("3", "");

		var searchWidgetProductNoConfig = getSearchConfig("2", "");
		var searchWidgetKeywordsNoConfig = getSearchConfig("3", "");

		var searchWidgetProductNoConfig = getSearchConfig("5", "");

                         Current
                        </label>
                        <input class="output-i force-numeric" id="charger-output-i" name="msg.data.specs.output.0.i" pattern="number" placeholder="" required="" type="text"/>
                        <span class="st-input__unit">
                         A
                        </span>
                        <small class="error">
                         This option is required and must be a number.
                        </small>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="margin-left-20">
                       <label>
                        <a class="add-remove-output-row block" href="#">
                         <svg class="st-svg st-svg--plus">
                          <use xlink:href="#icon-plus">
                          </use>
                         </svg>
                        </a>
                       </label>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </fieldset>
                    <div class="row collapse">
                     <div class="small-12">
                      <p class="st-edesign__result">
                       <span class="output-power output-value" data-label="Output: ">
                       </span>
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="st-edesign__form-submit row">
                  <div class="small-12 columns">
                   <input name="referrerPage" type="hidden" value="/content/st_com_cx/en"/>
                   <button class="st-button st-button--primary" form="edesign-form-f" type="submit" value="Start design">
                    <span>
                     Start design
                    </span>
                    <svg class="st-button__icon st-button__icon--right">
                     <use xlink:href="#icon-arrow-thin">
                     </use>
                    </svg>
                   </button>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </form>
                <div class="output-row-template hidden">
                 <div class="row collapse output-row editable-row st-flex st-flex--all-nowrap">
                  <div class="st-flex st-flex-sm--wrap">
                   <div class="st-input st-input--mobile-margin st-input--has-unit js-st-input">

                    </label>

                    </span>

                    </small>
                   </div>

        <div class="js-st-tab-content" data-content="tab2">
         <div class="row st-row">
          <div class="small-12 large-6 columns">
           <div class="st-title-wrapper">
            <h2 class="st-meet-st__title st-font-size--l st-text-color--dark-blue st-font--bold">
             <a class="st-homeheader-link" href="/content/st_com/en/about/st_company_information/who-we-are.html">
              Who we are
             </a>
            </h2>
           </div>
           <p class="st-copy st-font-size--s">
            Everywhere microelectronics make a positive contribution to people’s lives, ST is there. By getting more from technology to get more from life, ST stands for life.augmented.
           </p>
           <div class="st-facts-list">
            <div class="st-facts-list__item" style="border-left: 1px solid #e6e6e6; padding: 5px 12px; display: block;">
             <p class="st-number-label">
              46,000
             </p>
             <p class="st-copy st-font-size--s">
              Employees Worldwide
             </p>
            </div>
            <div class="st-facts-list__item" style="border-left: 1px solid #e6e6e6; padding: 5px 12px; display: block;">
             <p class="st-number-label">
              100,000+
             </p>
             <p class="st-copy st-font-size--s">
              Customers around the globe
             </p>
            </div>
            <div class="st-facts-list__item" style="border-left: 1px solid #e6e6e6; padding: 5px 12px; display: block;">
             <p class="st-number-label">
              7,800
             </p>
             <p class="st-copy st-font-size--s">
              Experts in R&amp;D &amp; product design
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
           <a class="st-button st-button--outline" href="/content/st_com/en/about/st_company_information/who-we-are.html">
            Learn more about ST
           </a>
          </div>
          <div class="small-12 large-6 columns st-meet-st--v2__content-wrapper">
           <div class="row">
            <div class="small-12 medium-6 columns">
             <h2 class="st-font-size--l st-text-color--dark-blue st-font--bold">
              <a class="st-homeheader-link" href="/content/st_com/en/browse/product-portfolio.html">
               Find the right product
              </a>
             </h2>
             <p class="st-copy st-font-size--s">
              With one of the industry’s broadest technology portfolios, ST's products are found in today's most innovative electronics solutions.
             </p>
             <a class="st-button st-button--primary" href="/content/st_com/en/browse/product-portfolio.html">
              <span>
               Browse products
              </span>
              <svg class="st-button__icon st-button__icon--right">
               <use xlink:href="#icon-arrow-thin">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </a>
            </div>
            <div class="small-12 medium-6 columns">
             <h2 class="st-font-size--l st-text-color--dark-blue st-font--bold">
              <a class="st-homeheader-link" href="/content/st_com/en/browse/applications.html">
               Explore applications
              </a>
             </h2>
             <p class="st-copy st-font-size--s">
              ST offers enabling silicon technologies that accelerate innovation across the full spectrum of electronics applications.
             </p>
             <a class="st-button st-button--primary" href="/content/st_com/en/browse/applications.html">
              <span>
               Browse applications
              </span>
              <svg class="st-button__icon st-button__icon--right">
               <use xlink:href="#icon-arrow-thin">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="js-st-tab-content" data-content="tab3">
         <div class="row st-row st-tools-and-software">
          <div class="small-12 medium-6 columns st-text-link-teaser">
           <a class="st-homeheader-link" href="/en/development-tools/software-development-tools.html">
            <div class="st-widget-title" href="#">
             <div class="st-widget-title__icon st-widget-title__icon--transparent">
              <svg class="st-svg">
               <use xlink:href="#icon-tools-software">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </div>
             <h3 class="st-widget-title__copy">
              Software Development Tools
             </h3>
            </div>
           </a>
           <p>
            ST and its partners have an assembled a comprehensive ecosystem to provide a wide range of software tools to support developers.  These include tools for our STM32, STM8 and SPC5 MCU families, as well as tools for Audio ICs, digital power conversion, motor control and a number of simulators. The tools are offered as free downloads from st.com or are available through our distribution partners.
           </p>
           <p class="st-font-size--s">
            <a class="st-link" href="/en/development-tools/software-development-tools.html">
             <span class="st-font-size--xs">
              Learn more
             </span>
             <svg class="st-link__icon st-link__icon--right st-link__icon--arrow-small">
              <use xlink:href="#icon-arrow-right">
              </use>
             </svg>
            </a>
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="small-12 medium-6 columns st-text-link-teaser">
           <a class="st-homeheader-link" href="/en/evaluation-tools.html">
            <div class="st-widget-title" href="#">
             <div class="st-widget-title__icon st-widget-title__icon--transparent">
              <svg class="st-svg">
               <use xlink:href="#icon-evaluation-tools">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </div>
             <h3 class="st-widget-title__copy">
              Evaluation Tools
             </h3>
            </div>
           </a>
           <p>
            ST proposes a wide range of boards enabling comprehensive evaluation of ST's products and solutions. Evaluation boards help you assess the features and performance of selected products and system solutions optimized for application design. Most have published schematics, BOM and Gerber files to facilitate hardware design and, where applicable, have demonstration software packages available.
           </p>
           <p class="st-font-size--s">
            <a class="st-link" href="/en/evaluation-tools.html">
             <span class="st-font-size--xs">
              Learn more
             </span>
             <svg class="st-link__icon st-link__icon--right st-link__icon--arrow-small">
              <use xlink:href="#icon-arrow-right">
              </use>
             </svg>
            </a>
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="small-12 medium-6 columns st-text-link-teaser">
           <a class="st-homeheader-link" href="/en/embedded-software.html">
            <div class="st-widget-title" href="#">
             <div class="st-widget-title__icon st-widget-title__icon--transparent">
              <svg class="st-svg">
               <use xlink:href="#icon-embedded-software">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </div>
             <h3 class="st-widget-title__copy">
              Embedded Software
             </h3>
            </div>
           </a>
           <p>
            ST and our partners provide an extensive range of Embedded Software to support developers working with ST products. Most are free to download on st.com while others are available from our partners' websites. As well as embedded software for our MCUs such as STM32, STM8, SPC5, ST also provides software for evaluation and development kits for products such as the ST25 NFC / RFID solutions, MEMS and sensors, motor control, audio and secure MCUs.
           </p>
           <p class="st-font-size--s">
            <a class="st-link" href="/en/embedded-software.html" target="_top">
             <span class="st-font-size--xs">
              Learn more
             </span>
             <svg class="st-link__icon st-link__icon--right st-link__icon--arrow-small">
              <use xlink:href="#icon-arrow-right">
              </use>
             </svg>
            </a>
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="small-12 medium-6 columns st-text-link-teaser">
           <a class="st-homeheader-link" href="/en/development-tools/hardware-development-tools.html">
            <div class="st-widget-title" href="#">
             <div class="st-widget-title__icon st-widget-title__icon--transparent">
              <svg class="st-svg">
               <use xlink:href="#icon-development-tools">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </div>
             <h3 class="st-widget-title__copy">
              Hardware Development Tools
             </h3>
            </div>
           </a>
           <p>
            ST's programmable products are supported by a range debugging and programming tools. These include emulators and low-cost in-circuit debugger/programmers. All are supported by free integrated development environments and C-compilers. Third-party partners also provide solutions that come complete with an integrated development environment and in-circuit debugger/programmer featuring a JTAG application interface.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a class="st-link" href="/en/development-tools/hardware-development-tools.html">
             <span class="st-font-size--xs">
              Learn more
             </span>
             <svg class="st-link__icon st-link__icon--right st-link__icon--arrow-small">
              <use xlink:href="#icon-arrow-right">
              </use>
             </svg>
            </a>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="js-st-tab-content" data-content="tab4">
         <div class="row st-row st-training-and-community">
          <div class="small-12 medium-6 large-3 columns st-text-link-teaser">
           <a class="st-homeheader-link" href="https://community.st.com/">

               </use>
              </svg>

             <h3 class="st-widget-title__copy">
              Community
             </h3>
            </div>
           </a>
           <p class="st-font-size--s">

           </p>
           <p>
            <a class="st-link" href="https://community.st.com/">
             <span class="st-font-size--xs">

       var screenSearchTypeDetected = getSearchScreenType();

    if (screenSearchTypeDetected == 'mobile') {
		var searchWidgetProductNoConfig = getSearchConfig("2", "");
		var searchWidgetKeywordsNoConfig = getSearchConfig("3", "");
	} else if (screenSearchTypeDetected == 'tablet') {
		var searchWidgetProductNoConfig = getSearchConfig("2", "");
		var searchWidgetKeywordsNoConfig = getSearchConfig("3", "");

           日本語

                 <div class="small-12 columns accept-terms-data">
                  <label class="encapsulate" for="newsletterSubscriptions">
                   <input class="no-margin-bottom" data-fv-notempty="false" id="newsletterSubscriptions" name="newsletterSubscriptions" type="checkbox"/>
                   <p>
                    <b>
                     I want to stay informed about ST's latest news
                    </b>
                   </p>
                   <p>
                    I consent that ST (as data controller according to the Privacy Policy) will keep a record of my navigation history and use that information as well as the personal data that I have communicated to ST for marketing purposes relevant to my interests. My personal data will be provided to ST affiliates and distributors of ST in countries located in the European Union and outside of the European Union for the same marketing purposes
                    <span class="st-read-more-label-wrap">
                     <span class="st-read-more-label-text">
                      Read more
                     </span>
                     <span class="st-read-more-label-arrow">
                      <i class="fa fa-chevron-right">
                      </i>
                     </span>
                     <span class="st-read-more-label-right-section">
                     </span>
                    </span>
                   </p>
                   <p>
                    ---------
                    <br/>
                    I understand that I can withdraw my consent at any time through opt-out links embedded in communication I receive or by managing my account settings. I can also exercise other user’s rights at any time as described in the Privacy Policy.
                   </p>
                  </label>
                  <span class="read-more-tooltip">
                   <p style="text-align: left;">
                    ST will retain your browsing history and use details of the products and services that you have previously accessed, purchased or downloaded to make suggestions to you for other products and services which ST believe you will also be interested in.
                    <br/>
                    <span style="line-height: 14.0px;">
                     ST uses the personal data that you provide directly to it and through your activity on ST websites in accordance with the
                     <a href="/content/st_com/en/common/privacy-policy.html" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                      Privacy Policy
                     </a>
                     , to send you (directly or via ST local affiliates or distributors) newsletters, advertisements or other specific and targeted marketing material about ST products and services. Your personal data will be provided to ST local affiliates and distributors in countries located in the European Union and outside of the European Union. You can consult the list of ST local affiliates and distributors in our website’s
                     <a href="/content/st_com/en/common/privacy-policy.html" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
                      Privacy Policy
                     </a>
                     . To send you specific and targeted marketing material, the information that you provide directly to ST and/or through your activity on ST websites may also be combined with other information that ST obtains from you in another context (e.g. if you enter into a business relationship with ST, its local affiliates or distributors).
                    </span>
                   </p>
                  </span>
                 </div>
                 <div class="small-12 columns">
                  <div class="accept-terms-data">
                   <label class="encapsulate" for="termsOfUse">
                    <input class="no-margin-bottom" id="termsOfUse" name="termsOfUse" type="checkbox"/>
                    I have read and understood the
                    <a href="/content/st_com/en/common/terms-of-use.html">
                     Terms of Use

     <div class="st-header__inner st-flex st-flex--sm-nowrap st-flex-items--sm-center">
      <div class="st-header__left st-flex st-flex--sm-nowrap st-flex st-flex-justify--sm-flex-start">
       <a class="st-header__logo" href="/content/st_com/en.html" x-cq-linkchecker="skip">
        <img alt="logo" src="/etc/clientlibs/st-site-cx/media/app/images/st-logo.svg"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="st-header__right st-flex st-flex-justify--sm-flex-end">
       <div class="st-header__search-icon js-st-search-toggle">
        <svg class="st-svg--block st-svg--search">
         <use xlink:href="#icon-search">
         </use>
        </svg>
       </div>
       <div class="st-header__cart--mobile">
        <a href="https://estore.st.com/en/checkout/cart/" target="_blank">
         <svg>
          <use xlink:href="#icon-cart-2">
          </use>
         </svg>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="st-nav__item st-header__user-icon" href="https://my.st.com/content/my_st_com/en.html" id="js-user-menu__login-link-mobile">
        <svg class="st-svg--block st-svg--user">
         <use xlink:href="#icon-user">
         </use>
        </svg>
       </a>
       <script>
        $(document).ready(function () {
                            var currentLanguage = $('html').attr('lang');
                            updateLoginLink('#js-user-menu__login-link', currentLanguage);
                            updateLoginLink('#js-user-menu__login-link-mobile', currentLanguage);
                        });

                        function updateLoginLink(elementId, currentLanguage) {
                            var loginLink = $(elementId);
                            var hrefAttr = loginLink.attr('href');
                            var serviceParamValue = '';
                            var referrerParam = loginLink.attr('data-referrer');

                            if (hrefAttr.indexOf('/user-registration.html') == -1 || !referrerParam) {
                                serviceParamValue = encodeURIComponent(hrefAttr);
                            } else {
                                serviceParamValue = encodeURIComponent(referrerParam);
                            }

                            var hrefSplitted = hrefAttr.split('//');
                            var scheme = hrefSplitted[0];
                            var domain = hrefSplitted[1].split('/')[0];
                            var targetUrl = scheme + '//' + domain + '/cas/login?lang=' + currentLanguage + '&service=' + serviceParamValue;
                            loginLink.attr('href', targetUrl);
                        }
       </script>
       <div class="st-header__burger-menu left-off-canvas-toggle js-st-side-navigation-toggle">
        <svg class="st-svg--block st-svg--burger">
         <use xlink:href="#icon-burger">
         </use>
        </svg>
        <svg class="st-svg--block st-svg--close">
         <use xlink:href="#icon-close">
         </use>
        </svg>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <nav class="st-nav--small show-for-medium-down in-view">
      <div class="st-nav__inner st-flex st-flex--sm-nowrap st-flex-items--sm-stretch st-flex-justify--sm-space-around">
       <div class="st-nav__item js-nav-bottom-off-canvas-toggle st-flex st-flex--sm-column st-flex--md-row st-flex-justify--sm-center st-flex-items--sm-center" data-target="products">
        <svg class="st-svg st-svg--all-products">
         <use xlink:href="#icon-all-products">
         </use>
        </svg>
        <span>
         Products
        </span>
       </div>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   if (typeof _satellite != 'undefined') {
        _satellite.pageBottomFired = true;
    }
    if (window.stBundleTimestamp) {
        $(window).on('blocked.scripts.enabled', function () {
            callPageBottom();
        });
    } else {
        callPageBottom();
    }

    function callPageBottom() {
        try {
            _satellite.pageBottom();
        } catch (err) {
            console.warn("satellite variable is undefined, DTM script is not included");
        }
    }
  </script>
